genericProperties.comment: Content admin should have access rights to manage security rules for streams, data connections, content libraries and extensions
genericProperties.name: ContentAdminRulesAccess
genericProperties.rule: user.roles = "ContentAdmin" and (resource.category = "Security" and (resource.resourcefilter matches "Stream_\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}" or resource.resourcefilter matches "DataConnection_\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}" or resource.resourcefilter matches "ContentLibrary_\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}" or resource.resourcefilter matches "Extension_\w{8}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{4}-\w{12}") or (resource.category = "Generic" and resource.subcategory = "SystemNotification"))
